Command *governance*
*********************

Documentation for the governance command in */cmds/wiz/governance.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE ``governance``

Shows leaders and manager for all guilds on the MUD.
Can also set managers and leaders. Use:

   governance <guild name>

and follow the prompts.
